name: Something's Amiss in the Library (DEMO)
description:
Leaf enrolls in a self-directed learning institution, trying to find direction and meaning. But the academy has more lurking in its shadows than may initially meet the eye!

Note: This Game as of now is unfinished, and considering a very small production team (pretty much just me) as well as the potentially unrealistic vision for the complete project, don't expect a completed game anytime soon.

Nevertheless, please have fun and enjoy the game!
